ayas.arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayas.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth declares the glory of Allah, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death; and He has power over all things.
ayas.transliteration: lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yuḥyī wayumīt ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلْأَوَّلُ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: He is the First and the Last and the Ascendant (over all) and the Knower of hidden things, and He is Cognizant of all things.
ayas.transliteration: huwal-awwalu wal-ākhiru waẓ ẓāhiru wal bāṭin ۖ wahuwa bikulli shay-in `alīm

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: He it is who created the heavens and the earth in six periods, and He is firm in power; He knows that which goes deep down into the earth and that which comes forth out of it, and that which comes down from the heaven and that which goes up into it, and He is with you wherever you are; and Allah sees what you do.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmin thummas-tawā `alal-`arsh ۚ ya`lamu mā yaliju fil-arḍi wa mā yakhruju minhā wa mā yanzilu minas samā-i wa mā ya`ruju fīhā ۖ wahuwa ma`akum ayna mā kuntum ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna baṣīr

ayas.arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
ayas.translation: His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and to Allah are (all) affairs returned.
ayas.transliteration: lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wa ilallāhi turja`ul-umūr

ayas.arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayas.translation: He causes the night to enter in upon the day, and causes the day to enter in upon the night, and He is Cognizant of what is in the hearts.
ayas.transliteration: yūlijul layla fin nahāri wayūlijun nahāra fil layl ۚ wahuwa `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

ayas.arabic: ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Believe in Allah and His Apostle, and spend out of what He has made you to be successors of; for those of you who believe and spend shall have a great reward.
ayas.transliteration: āminū billāhi warasūlihi wa-anfiqū mimmā ja`alakum mustakhlafīna fīh ۖ fal ladhīna āmanū minkum wa-anfaqū lahum ajrun kabīr

ayas.arabic: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ ۙ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَـٰقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And what reason have you that you should not believe in Allah? And the Apostle calls on you that you may believe in your Lord, and indeed He has made a covenant with you if you are believers.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā lakum lā tu-minūna billāhi war rasūlu yad`ūkum litu-minū birabbikum waqad akhadha mīthāqakum in kuntum mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦٓ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: He it is who sends down clear communications upon His servant, that he may bring you forth from utter darkness into light; and most surely Allah is Kind, Merciful to you.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī yunazzilu `alā `abdihi āyātin bayyinātin liyukhrijakum minaẓ ẓulumāti ilan nūr ۚ wa innallāha bikum lara-ūfun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِى مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ ٱلْفَتْحِ وَقَـٰتَلَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَقَـٰتَلُوا۟ ۚ وَكُلًّا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
ayas.translation: And what reason have you that you should not spend in Allah's way? And Allah's is the inheritance of the heavens and the earth, not alike among you are those who spent before the victory and fought (and those who did not): they are more exalted in rank than those who spent and fought afterwards; and Allah has promised good to all; and Allah is Aware of what you do.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā lakum allā tunfiqū fī sabīlillāhi walillāhi mīrāthus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ lā yastawī minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-ḥi waqātal ۚ ulā-ika a`ẓamu darajatan minal ladhīna anfaqū min ba`du waqātalū ۚ wakullan wa`adallāhul ḥusnā ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna khabīr

ayas.arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يُقْرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَـٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Who is there that will offer to Allah a good gift so He will double it for him, and he shall have an excellent reward.
ayas.transliteration: man dhal ladhī yuqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanan fayuḍā`ifahu lahu walahu ajrun karīm

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِم بُشْرَىٰكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: On that day you will see the faithful men and the faithful women-- their light running before them and on their right hand-- good news for you today: gardens beneath which rivers flow, to abide therein, that is the grand achievement.
ayas.transliteration: yawma taral mu-minīna wal mu-mināti yas`ā nūruhum bayna aydīhim wabi-aymānihim bushrākumul yawma jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ٱرْجِعُوا۟ وَرَآءَكُمْ فَٱلْتَمِسُوا۟ نُورًا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍ لَّهُۥ بَابٌۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةُ وَظَـٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلْعَذَابُ
ayas.translation: On the day when the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women will say to those who believe: Wait for us, that we may have light from your light; it shall be said: Turn back and seek a light. Then separation would be brought about between them, with a wall having a door in it; (as for) the inside of it, there shall be mercy in it, and (as for) the outside of it, before it there shall be punishment.
ayas.transliteration: yawma yaqūlul munāfiqūna wal munāfiqātu lilladhīna āmanun-ẓurūnā naqtabis min nūrikum qīlar-ji`ū warā-akum fal tamisū nūran faḍuriba baynahum bisūrin lahu bābun bāṭinuhu fīhir raḥmatu waẓāhiruhu min qibalihil `adhāb

ayas.arabic: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَٱرْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْأَمَانِىُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ
ayas.translation: They will cry out to them: Were we not with you? They shall say: Yea! but you caused yourselves to fall into temptation, and you waited and doubted, and vain desires deceived you till the threatened punishment of Allah came, while the archdeceiver deceived you about Allah.
ayas.transliteration: yunādūnahum alam nakun ma`akum ۖ qālū balā walākinnakum fatantum anfusakum watarabbaṣtum wartabtum wagharratkumul-amāniyyu ḥattā jā-a amrullāhi wagharrakum billāhil gharūr

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ مَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ هِىَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: So today ransom shall not be accepted from you nor from those who disbelieved; your abode is the fire; it is your friend and evil is the resort.
ayas.transliteration: fal yawma lā yu-khadhu minkum fidyatun walā minal ladhīna kafarū ۚ ma-wākumun nār ۖ hiya mawlākum ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Has not the time yet come for those who believe that their hearts should be humble for the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And that they should not be like those who were given the Book before, but the time became prolonged to them, so their hearts hardened, and most of them are transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: alam ya-ni lilladhīna āmanū an takhsha`a qulūbuhum lidhikrillāhi wa mā nazala minal ḥaqqi walā yakūnū kal ladhīna ūtul kitāba min qablu faṭāla `alayhimul-amadu faqasat qulūbuhum ۖ wakathīrun minhum fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحْىِ ٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its death; indeed, We have made the communications clear to you that you may understand.
ayas.transliteration: i'-lamū annallāha yuḥyil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā ۚ qad bayyannā lakumul-āyāti la`allakum ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلْمُصَّدِّقَـٰتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَـٰعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Surely (as for) the charitable men and the charitable women and (those who) set apart for Allah a goodly portion, it shall be doubled for them and they shall have a noble reward.
ayas.transliteration: innal muṣṣaddiqīna wal muṣṣaddiqāti wa-aqraḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍā`afu lahum walahum ajrun karīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who believe in Allah and His apostles, these it is that are the truthful and the faithful ones in the sight of their Lord: they shall have their reward and their light, and (as for) those who disbelieve and reject Our communications, these are the inmates of the hell.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū billāhi warusulihi ulā-ika humuṣ ṣiddīqūn ۖ wash shuhadā-u `inda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanūruhum ۖ wal ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū bi-āyātinā ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābul jaḥīm

ayas.arabic: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَزِينَةٌ وَتَفَاخُرٌۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌ فِى ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَوْلَـٰدِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ ٱلْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَـٰمًا ۖ وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٌ ۚ وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْغُرُورِ
ayas.translation: Know that this world's life is only sport and play and gaiety and boasting among yourselves, and a vying in the multiplication of wealth and children, like the rain, whose causing the vegetation to grow, pleases the husbandmen, then it withers away so that you will see it become yellow, then it becomes dried up and broken down; and in the hereafter is a severe chastisement and (also) forgiveness from Allah and (His) pleasure; and this world's life is naught but means of deception.
ayas.transliteration: i'-lamū annamal ḥayātud dunyā la`ibun walahwun wazīnatun watafākhurun baynakum watakāthurun fil-amwāli wal-awlād ۖ kamathali ghaythin a`jabal kuffāra nabātuhu thumma yahīju fatarāhu muṣfarran thumma yakūnu ḥuṭāmā ۖ wafil-ākhirati `adhābun shadīdun wa maghfiratun minallāhi wariḍwān ۚ wa mal ḥayātud dunyā illā matā`ul ghurūr

ayas.arabic: سَابِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا كَعَرْضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أُعِدَّتْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: Hasten to forgiveness from your Lord and to a garden the extensiveness of which is as the extensiveness of the heaven and the earth; it is prepared for those who believe in Allah and His apostles; that is the grace of Allah: He gives it to whom He pleases, and Allah is the Lord of mighty grace.
ayas.transliteration: sābiqū ilā maghfiratim min rabbikum wajannatin `arḍuhā ka`arḍis samā-i wal-arḍi u`iddat lilladhīna āmanū billāhi warusulih ۚ dhālika faḍlullāhi yu-tīhi man yashā-u ۚ wallāhu dhul faḍlil `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَآ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
ayas.translation: No evil befalls on the earth nor in your own souls, but it is in a book before We bring it into existence; surely that is easy to Allah:
ayas.transliteration: mā aṣāba min muṣībatin fil-arḍi walā fī anfusikum illā fī kitābin min qabli an nabra-ahā ۚ inna dhālika `alallāhi yasīr

ayas.arabic: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍ فَخُورٍ
ayas.translation: So that you may not grieve for what has escaped you, nor be exultant at what He has given you; and Allah does not love any arrogant boaster:
ayas.transliteration: likaylā ta-saw `alā mā fātakum walā tafraḥū bimā ātākum ۗ wallāhu lā yuḥibbu kulla mukhtālin fakhūr

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
ayas.translation: Those who are niggardly and enjoin niggardliness on men; and whoever turns back, then surely Allah is He Who is the Selfsufficient, the Praised.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yabkhalūna waya-murūnan nāsa bil bukhl ۗ wa man yatawalla fa-innallāha huwal ghaniyyul ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَأَنزَلْنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلْنَا ٱلْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
ayas.translation: Certainly We sent Our apostles with clear arguments, and sent down with them the Book and the balance that men may conduct themselves with equity; and We have made the iron, wherein is great violence and advantages to men, and that Allah may know who helps Him and His apostles in the secret; surely Allah is Strong, Mighty.
ayas.transliteration: laqad arsalnā rusulanā bil bayyināti wa-anzalnā ma`ahumul kitāba wal mīzāna liyaqūman nāsu bil qisṭ ۖ wa-anzalnal ḥadīda fīhi ba-sun shadīdun wa manāfi`u linnāsi waliya`lamallāhu man yanṣuruhu warusulahu bil ghayb ۚ innallāha qawiyyun `azīz

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مُّهْتَدٍ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And certainly We sent Nuh and Ibrahim and We gave to their offspring the (gift of) prophecy and the Book; so there are among them those who go aright, and most of them are transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan wa ibrāhīma waja`alnā fī dhurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal kitāb ۖ faminhum muhtad ۖ wakathīrun minhum fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ قَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيْنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْإِنجِيلَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأْفَةً وَرَحْمَةً وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً ٱبْتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبْنَـٰهَا عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ رِضْوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوْهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا ۖ فَـَٔاتَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Then We made Our apostles to follow in their footsteps, and We sent Isa son of Marium afterwards, and We gave him the Injeel, and We put in the hearts of those who followed him kindness and mercy; and (as for) monkery, they innovated it-- We did not prescribe it to them-- only to seek Allah's pleasure, but they did not observe it with its due observance; so We gave to those of them who believed their reward, and most of them are transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: thumma qaffaynā `alā āthārihim birusulinā waqaffaynā bi`īsab-ni maryama wa-ātaynāhul-injīla waja`alnā fī qulūbil ladhīnat-taba`ūhu ra-fatan waraḥmatan warahbāniyyatanib-tada`ūhā mā katabnāhā `alayhim illab-tighā-a riḍwānillāhi famā ra`awhā ḥaqqa ri`āyatihā ۖ fa-ātaynal ladhīna āmanū minhum ajrahum ۖ wakathīrun minhum fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤْتِكُمْ كِفْلَيْنِ مِن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ نُورًا تَمْشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: O you who believe! be careful of (your duty to) Allah and believe in His Apostle: He will give you two portions of His mercy, and make for you a light with which you will walk, and forgive you, and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful;
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanut-taqullāha wa-āminū birasūlihi yu-tikum kiflayni min raḥmatihi wayaj`al lakum nūran tamshūna bihi wayaghfir lakum ۚ wallāhu ghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: لِّئَلَّا يَعْلَمَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَلَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ مِّن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱلْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: So that the followers of the Book may know that they do not control aught of the grace of Allah, and that grace is in Allah's hand, He gives it to whom He pleases; and Allah is the Lord of mighty grace.
ayas.transliteration: li-allā ya`lama ahlul kitābi allā yaqdirūna `alā shay-in min faḍlillāhi wa-annal faḍla biyadillāhi yu-tīhi man yashā-u ۚ wallāhu dhul faḍlil `aẓīm
